project_descr: The project focuses on decentralization, strengthening of local democracy, improvement of the quality of public services, as well as advancement of the citizen’s participation in local decision-making.

outputs.output_descr: The project aims to advance decentralization, regional and local governance reform and development through strengthening capacities of central and sub-national authorities.
donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
